title: Leading Global Portfolio Investment
description: In 2023, the United Kingdom achieved a remarkable portfolio investment net value of $222.78 billion, showcasing its strong position in global financial markets.

title: Thriving Entrepreneurial Ecosystem
description: The UK registered 790,311 new businesses in 2022, reflecting a vibrant and dynamic entrepreneurial environment.

title: High Primary School Enrollment for Boys
description: In 2017, the UK achieved a near-universal primary school enrollment rate for boys at 99.63%, ensuring educational access for young males.

title: Perfect Persistence to Grade 5 for Boys
description: As of 2021, the UK reported a 100% persistence rate for boys reaching grade 5, indicating strong retention in primary education.

title: Minimal Battle-Related Deaths
description: In 2019, the UK recorded only 1 battle-related death, highlighting its peaceful domestic environment.
